body.p: Richmond, Kentucky, soldier. Served in the 11th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (C.S.A.) as private and sergeant from September 10, 1862 to February 19, 1864. Captured near Buffington Island, Ohio, on July 19, 1863. Prisoner of war at Camp Morton, Indiana, from July 23, 1863, to August 1863. Prisoner of war at Camp Douglas, Illinois, from August 1863 to February 19, 1864. Died of smallpox while in Camp Douglas.
